namespace.ui:title: namespace
namespace.ui:help: The target namespace for the Pod

image.ui:title: Image
image.ui:help: The image name to use for the pod, for example nginx:alpine

cpuLimit.ui:title: CPU limit
cpuLimit.ui:help: The container's CPU spec, for example 500m

memoryLimit.ui:title: Memory Limit
memoryLimit.ui:help: The container's CPU spec, for example 128Mi

containerPort.ui:title: Container port
containerPort.ui:help: The container's exposed port, for example 90
